Query Google throught the fluent API


$googleUrl = new GoogleUrl();
$googleUrl->setLang("en")
       ->setTld("com")
       ->setNumberResults(10);

$simpsonsPage = $googleUrl->search("simpsons");
View the query documentation

Analyze the natural results of the page


$naturalResults = $simpsonsPage->getNaturalResults();

foreach($naturalResults as $result){

    switch($result->getType()){

        case "classical":
            $resultTitle = $result->title;
            $website     = $result->website;
            $url         = $result->targetUrl;
            break;


        case "imageGroup":
            foreach($result->getItems() as $imageResult){
                $url = $imageResult->targetUrl;
                $website     = $result->website;
            }
            break;


        // ...
    }
}
More informations about result types

Check if your site appears in adWords results



$adWordsResults = $simpsonsPage->getAdWordsResults();

foreach($adWordsResults->getBodyTopResults() as $result){

    if($result->website == "my-simpsons-website.com"){
        $position = $website->position;
        echo "My web site is number $position in the top results";
    }

}
Learn more about adWords results

Use proxy to do a lot of queries



$proxy1 = new GoogleUrl\ProxyString("mylogin:myPassword@someproxyAddress:8080");
$googleUrl->setLang("de");
          ->setTld("de");

$googleUrl->search("Simpsons deutsche Stimme", $proxy1);


$proxy2 = new GoogleUrl\ProxyString("mylogin:myPassword@anotherProxyAddress:8080");
$googleUrl->setLang("fr");
          ->setTld("fr");

$googleUrl->search("Simpsons Ã©pisodes", $proxy2);
Learn how to rotate between many proxies
